Question 4 (24 points) Question 5 (8 points) For each of the functions below,
state the domain and range, the restrictions, the intervals of increasing and
decreasing, the roots, y-intercepts, and vertices. The point (1,‐2) is on the
graph of . Describe the following transformations on , and determine the
resulting point. a) f(x) = 2x 2 −8 b) f(x) = + √x−2 c) f(x) = x+1 x−1 f(x) f(x)
a) g(x) = 2f(x) + 3 b) g(x) =f(x+ 1)−3 c) g(x) =−f(2x) d) g(x) =−f(−x−1) + 3
